posts.title: Jurassic World Trainable Robotic Pet Blue
posts.content: Fulfill your career goals by becoming a real life raptor trainer with this Jurassic World trainable robot. Modeled after fan-favorite raptor Blue, it comes with its very own remote control that is styled just like Owen’s clicker so that you can easily control your clever girl.

posts.title: You Touched Your Genitals Sanitizer
posts.content: Shaking hands is an unfortunately risky part of human interaction – it can solidify relationships, but it can also pass along disgusting germs and bacteria. Stay safe with the only hand sanitizer on the market that protects against hands that possibly touched genitals only moments prior.

posts.title: Microchip Pet Door
posts.content: Grant your furry friend easy access in and out of the house – without having to worry about unwanted critters sneaking in – by installing the microchip pet door. It scans your pet’s microchip or RFID collar tag and can be programmed to lock at any time you set.

posts.title: Twister Bed Sheets
posts.content: Turn bedtime into playtime with the twister bed sheets. The sheets gloriously transform your mattress into a naughty full size twister play mat so you can enjoy this classic game the way it was truly meant to be played – naked, of course!

posts.title: 2-In-1 Shovel And Rake
posts.content: Handle a variety of backyard chores without having to constantly switch tools by grabbing a hold of this 2-in-1 shovel and rake. The clever and functional ergonomic design of this versatile garden tool allows you to perform a variety of tasks around your yard.

posts.title: Adjustable Grip Wrench
posts.content: Never buy another wrench set again with the adjustable grip wrench – the versatile wrench that fits over any type of nuts and bolts. The adjustable grip wrench instantly adjusts to fit any small sized tubing or piping, from 1/2 inch to 3/4 inch.

posts.title: Goal Oriented Daily Planner
posts.content: Achieve your set goals in just 100 days using this goal oriented daily planner. This elegant hard cover notebook comes full of helpful features like nightly recaps, quarterly reviews and inspiring quotes to help you stay on track.

posts.title: Smart Baby Monitor
posts.content: Ensure your bundle of joy remains safe when they’re not with you by tracking their every movement using the smart baby monitor. Designed for today’s tech savvy parents, it tracks and sends your baby’s position, sounds, and breathing directly to your smartphone.

posts.title: Smartphone Breathalyzer Keychain
posts.content: Help ensure a night of drinking remains fun and incident-free by testing your blood alcohol level using the smartphone breathalyzer keychain. This handy keychain allows you to easily measure your BAC so you can monitor your buzz and drink responsibly.

posts.title: Wine Making Kit
posts.content: Expand your repertoire of home brewing skills by making your own wine. Housed in a rustic pine box, the kit requires no prior experience to use and includes everything necessary to produce your first batch in just four short weeks.

posts.title: Piper DIY Wooden Computer Kit
posts.content: Make technology fun for the kids by showing them how to build their own computer using the Piper DIY wooden computer kit. By following the included blueprints they’ll be able to piece together a Raspberry Pi 3 powered PC with a 7″ LCD display.

posts.title: Remote Control Pool Skimmer
posts.content: Turn the mundane task of pool cleaning into a fun game using this remote control pool skimmer. This battery powered vessel can operate for 5 hours on a single charge and comes with a 100 foot R/C range so you can travel throughout the entire pool.
